connection.none: Impossible de se connecter à XBMC

playing.nothing: Aucun media en cours de lecture

dialog.lastfmLove: This will add the currently playing track to your personal 'Loved tracks' on Last.FM.\n\nAre you sure you want to do this?
dialog.lastfmHate:
This will add the currently playing song to your 'Banned tracks' list.
The song will never be played again when listening to Last.FM streamed radio.

Are you sure you want to do this?
dialog.ipNotConfigured: The configuration form will allow you to configure XBMControl.
dialog.unableToConnect: Please make sure XBMC is running and the ip address is correct.

label.showInTaskbar: Afficher dans la barre de taches
label.showNowPlayingBalloonTip: Afficher la bulle d'information 'Lecture en cours'
label.showPlayStatusBalloonTip: Afficher une bulle d'information montrant l'état de lecture
label.showConnectionStatusBalloonTip: Afficher une bulle d'information montrant l'état de la connexion à XBMC

ipAddress.required: Une adresse IP valide est obligatoire
